official_title: A bill to amend the civil service retirement provisions of title 5, United States Code, to provide individuals double credit for periods of military service during which such individuals were held as prisoners of war.

summary.text: Provides two days of civil service retirement credit for each day of military service during which an individual was a prisoner of war during World War II, the Korean conflict, or the Vietnam era.

titles.title: A bill to amend the civil service retirement provisions of title 5, United States Code, to provide individuals double credit for periods of military service during which such individuals were held as prisoners of war.
